name: Affliction
description: Impose one or more limiting conditions on a target. Resistance and conditions defined by user.

name: Communication
parameter_prompt: Type of Communication (e.g., Mental, Radio, Tech, Any Special Sense)
description: Transmit information over a distance. Rank determines range. 4 points/rank for one type, 5 for any type. Area, Dimensional, Subtle are common extras.

name: Comprehend
description: Understand things you otherwise could not. Each type of comprehension has a specific flat cost (e.g., Languages 2-6 PP, Animals 2 PP, Machines 2 PP, Spirits 2 PP). The 'rank' is nominal for this container.

name: Concealment
parameter_prompt: Sense(s) to conceal from (e.g., Visual, Auditory, Mental). Normal Sight is 2 ranks.
description: Become undetectable to one or more sense types. Cost is per sense type rank (Normal Vision is 2 ranks for 4 PP). All of one sense type is 5 ranks. All senses is 10 ranks.

name: Create
resistance: Dodge (to avoid being trapped), Toughness (of created object)
description: Create solid objects. Rank determines Toughness and Volume of created objects. Max Toughness & Volume Rank typically = Create Rank.

name: Damage
description: Inflict harm on a target.

name: Deflect
resistance: None (uses Deflect rank vs attack check)
description: Actively defend against attacks, potentially improving defense or reflecting attacks. Used with the Defend action.

name: Duplication
description: Create one or more duplicates of yourself. Each duplicate is built on (Rank x 15) Power Points. Modifiers like Heroic, Horde, Multiple Minions apply.

name: Enhanced Trait
description: Improve one of your existing traits. Cost equals the normal cost of the improved ranks for that trait.

name: Environment
parameter_prompt: Environmental Conditions (e.g., Cold 2, Impede Movement 1, Visibility -2)
description: Alter environmental conditions in an area. 1 PP/rank for one condition, 2 PP/rank for two, per -2/-5 penalty imposed or 2 ranks of effect.

name: Feature
parameter_prompt: Describe the minor ability or benefit
description: A minor, unusual trait or capability costing 1 Power Point per rank. Max ranks subject to GM approval.

name: Flight
description: Fly at a speed rank equal to power rank.

name: Growth
description: Increase size, gaining Strength, Stamina, Intimidation, Mass, Speed, Reach, and penalties to Stealth, Dodge, Parry. Package deal.

name: Healing
description: Repair Damage conditions and aid recovery. Modifiers like Restorative, Persistent, Resurrection, Stabilize, Affects Objects, Energizing.

name: Illusion
parameter_prompt: Senses Affected by Illusion and Scope
description: Create false sensory impressions. Cost varies by number and type of senses affected.

name: Immortality
description: Return from death after a period determined by rank (Time Rank 19 - Immortality Rank).

name: Immunity
description: Become immune to certain effects. Cost is fixed based on type of immunity (e.g., Disease 1 PP, Life Support 10 PP, All Fortitude Effects 30 PP).

name: Insubstantial
description: Assume a less solid form. Rank 1 (Fluid, 5PP), 2 (Gaseous, 10PP), 3 (Energy, 15PP), 4 (Incorporeal, 20PP).

name: Leaping
description: Jump great distances. Distance rank equal to power rank.

name: Mind Reading
description: Discern the surface thoughts of a target. Modifiers: Cumulative, Effortless, Sensory Link, Subtle.

name: Morph
parameter_prompt: Describe the forms or group of forms
description: Change physical appearance. Rank determines range of forms (Rank 1 = one other form, Rank 2 = small group, etc.). Metamorph extra allows changing traits.

name: Move Object
resistance: Strength or Dodge (to avoid being grabbed/hit)
description: Telekinetically lift and move objects. Effective Strength equal to rank. Modifiers: Damaging, Perception Range, Precise.

name: Movement
parameter_prompt: Specific Movement Type (e.g., Dimensional Travel, Permeate, Slithering, Wall-Crawling, Water-Walking)
description: Various modes of movement like Dimensional Travel (2 PP/rank), Permeate (1 PP/rank for slow, 3 PP/rank for normal speed), Slithering, Sure-Footed, Swinging, Wall-Crawling (1 or 2 PP), Water-Walking. Each rank of this effect buys ranks in chosen movement types.

name: Nullify
resistance: Opposed Check (Nullify Rank vs. Effect Rank or Will)
parameter_prompt: Descriptor of powers to Nullify (e.g., Fire, Magic, specific power). Use Broad extra for categories.
description: Counter or dispel another effect. Cost can increase with Broad, Simultaneous extras.

name: Protection
description: Grants bonus to Toughness defense. Often Sustained via modifier if a Force Field.

name: Quickness
description: Perform routine tasks faster. Time rank for tasks = normal time rank - Quickness rank.

name: Regeneration
parameter_prompt: Recovery Rate Details (e.g., All damage conditions 1/round requires high ranks)
description: Recover from damage faster. Rank determines recovery bonus and rate for conditions (see DHH p.157).

name: Remote Sensing
parameter_prompt: Sense Types (Visual counts as 2). Total ranks cost: (Ranks for chosen senses) x Power Rank.
description: Project senses to a distant location. Cost 1 PP/rank for one sense type, +1 PP/rank for each additional (Visual counts as two).

name: Shrinking
description: Decrease size, gaining Stealth, Dodge, Parry, and penalties to Strength, Intimidation, Speed, Mass. Package deal.

name: Speed
description: Move at high speed. Ground speed rank = power rank.

name: Summon
parameter_prompt: Describe creature(s) summoned and special modifiers
description: Call a creature to aid you. Summoned creature is built on (Rank x 15) Power Points. Modifiers: Heroic (+2/r), Horde (+1/r), Multiple Minions (+X/r), Variable Type (+1 or +2 flat).

name: Swimming
description: Swim at high speed. Water speed rank = power rank.

name: Teleport
description: Instantly transport. Rank determines distance. Modifiers: Accurate, Extended, Portal, Turnabout, etc.

name: Transform

costOptions.label: Narrow Group of Forms (e.g., specific type of animal/object)
Related Group of Forms (e.g., any animal, any mineral)
Major Group of Forms (e.g., any living being, any object)

parameter_prompt: Describe transformation effect, scope, and typical forms
description: Change the form of a subject. Cost varies by scope of transformation (2-5 PP/rank).

name: Variable
description: Gain a pool of (Rank x 5) Character Points to allocate to other traits fitting specific descriptors. Cost is 7 PP per rank of Variable.

name: Weaken
parameter_prompt: Trait(s) to Weaken (e.g., Toughness, Strength, a specific power). Use Broad extra for categories.
description: Reduce a target's trait ranks. Modifiers: Affects Objects, Broad, Simultaneous, Progressive.
